projects.title: REST API (.NET CORE)
projects.bodyText: A RESTful Web API solution built using .NET Core 3.1. Architectural Style : Domain Driven Design. Business Context: A retail book publisher.

projects.title: Conway's Game of Life
projects.bodyText: A pure JavaScript implementation of Conway's Game of Life, pre-loaded with a few configurations.

projects.title: Social Media Advertisement Targetting using SCC
projects.bodyText: Social Media Advertisement Targetting using Strongly Connected Components Algorithm.

projects.title: Word Processor
projects.bodyText: A simple word processor that counts word frequency and replaces words using the Visitor and Strategy Design patterns.

projects.title: Record Backup
projects.bodyText: Java Console program to create automatic backups of student records using the Observer Pattern.
